modName: Sound for Drinking Fountains of Skyrim EN DE - DELETED
summary: Sound for the famous drinking fountains
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xDzLJ1i.png[/IMG][/center]

This mod is an immersion expansion for MannyGT's great mod "Drinking Fountains of Skyrim" and/ or
Darkangel13's mod "D13 Drinking Fountains of Skyrim - Dragonborn expansion",the fountains are
emitting water splashing sound now.


Diese Mod ist eine Erweiterung für MannyGT's großartige Mod "Drinking Fountains of Skyrim"
und/ oder Darkangel13's Mod "D13 Drinking Fountains of Skyrim - Dragonborn expansion",
sie versieht die Wasserspender mit plätscherndem Wassergeräusch.



[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ESIBec9.png[/IMG][/center]
Via Nexus Mod Manager




[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8w8gpUX.png[/IMG][/center]
v1.0: First release, manual installation, buggy :-#
v2.0: Bugs killed (I hope so...), NMM installer to choose language, DLC support and sound volume.
v2.1: Removed the very loud sound file version, added a less loud one.
v2.1.01: Bug in install script removed.
author: ArcherArcher

files.name: Sound for Drinking Fountains of Skyrim EN DE
